name: Trapinch
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

poke_power.name: Gather Sand
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Trapinch is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a basic {F} card and attach it to Trapinch.

attacks.name: Grind
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Trapinch.
